roleset.name: make new-looking
roleset.note: RENOVATE-V NOTES: Many cases with tough trace chains. Be careful, and don't be afraidto leave infinitives without and explicit agent (arg0: *, in otherwords). (from renovate.01-v)
RENOVATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to renovate.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from renovation.01-n)

example.name: nice and clear
example.text: [State and city officials]-1 are still negotiating with developers [*-1]to renovate historic theaters and build and operate a merchandise mart and hotel.

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: renovations to the already existing housing stock
example.arg: to the already existing housing stock

example.name: both args
example.text: China's renovation of the Grand Canal
